title: Blueprint, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Vanity", November 27, 1934
medium: Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper
inscribed: Lower right: SCALE 1"=1'-0", 8095 [circled]; lower left: VANITY/11/27/34; center right in red color pencil: WHITE LAC./WHITE SYCAMORE [arrows toward perspective drawing]; lower left in red color pencil: POL. CHROM.; center left in red color pencil: 58 1/2" OVERALL; dimensions and instructions inscribed
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of vanity. Raised left side in white sycamore; two stacked drawers at left with white lacquer surface and polished chrome horizontal pulls. Glass surface at right with rounded right edge. Right side and base in white sycamore. Open space underneath surface at right; mirror above vanity.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Vanity", November 27, 1934.
November 27, 1934. Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-792.
